## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| filter_type | Column control type. Choose between a dropdown menu, buttons or a slider. Allowed values: "dropdown", "buttons", "slider". |
| filter_title | Filter title. |
| filter_group_button | Grouped buttons. Boolean (True/False). |
| filter_group_button_width_type | Button group type. Allowed values: "auto", "full", "fixed". |
| filter_group_button_width_number | Button group width. Max: 100 |
| filter_dropdown_width_type | Dropdown width type. Allowed values: "auto", "full", "fixed". |
| filter_dropdown_width_number | Dropdown width. Max: 100 |
| filter_slider_background_color | Slider background color |
| filter_slider_font_color | Slider font color |
| filter_slider_handle_color | Slider handle color |
| filter_slider_width_number | Slider width number. Max: 100 |
| filter_slider_margin | Slider label width. Max: 50 |
| filter_slider_handle_height | Slider handle height. Max: 10 |
| filter_slider_track_height | Slider track height. Max: 10 |
| filter_slider_play_button | Add a slider play button. Boolean (True/False). |
| filter_slider_auto_loop | Slider automatically replays. Boolean (True/False). |
| filter_slider_step_time | Time between steps. Measured in seconds, positive values move the slider left to right, negative values move the slider right to left. Min: -100. Max: 100 |
